item.title: Usage of Hugo Short Codes
item.description:
Despiting all hugo internal shortcodes, I'v wrote or modified some shortcodes.

This page shows the usage of those shortcodes, especially customized shortcodes.

item.title: What I'v done to customize this blog
item.description:
I'v done little work to make this blog a little more 'personalized'.

Here I marked them down, in case of forgotten.
